com.stephentuso.welcome

Interface WelcomePage.OnChangeListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WelcomeBasicFragment, WelcomeFullScreenParallaxFragment, WelcomeParallaxFragment, WelcomeTitleFragment
    Enclosing class:
    WelcomePage<T extends WelcomePage>

    public static interface WelcomePage.OnChangeListener
    Interface to be implemented by fragments that are part of a WelcomeActivity

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onWelcomeScreenPageScrolled(int pageIndex, float offset, int offsetPixels)
      Called when this page is coming into view
      void onWelcomeScreenPageScrollStateChanged(int pageIndex, int state)
      Called when the scroll state of the ViewPager changes
      void onWelcomeScreenPageSelected(int pageIndex, int selectedPageIndex)
      Called when the selected page changes

    • Method Detail

      • onWelcomeScreenPageScrolled

        void onWelcomeScreenPageScrolled(int pageIndex,
                                 float offset,
                                 int offsetPixels)
        Called when this page is coming into view
        Parameters:
        pageIndex - The position index of this page
        offset - The % offset of this page, negative if page is off the screen on the right, positive if off on the left
        offsetPixels - The offset of this page in pixels, negative if page is off the screen on the right, positive if off on the left

      • onWelcomeScreenPageSelected

        void onWelcomeScreenPageSelected(int pageIndex,
                                 int selectedPageIndex)
        Called when the selected page changes
        Parameters:
        pageIndex - The position index of this page
        selectedPageIndex - The index of the page that was selected

      • onWelcomeScreenPageScrollStateChanged

        void onWelcomeScreenPageScrollStateChanged(int pageIndex,
                                           int state)
        Called when the scroll state of the ViewPager changes
        Parameters:
        pageIndex - The position index of this page
        state - The new scroll state
